CatDescriptText: William Staples, 815 Brushton Avenue, Democrat, 13th Ward, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 7, 1957, pg. 3 with question: "Who is your Ward Chairman? Does he have any power? Does he exert it?" Answer reads: "The ward chairman is Mrs. Sarah Kirk. She has the power to do things, but I feel that she's not doing too much for Negroes."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of William Staples wearing checkered baseball cap, holding newspaper, pose on street with brick building and store in background
